attributes.action: Give 16 year olds the chance to vote in local and general elections.
attributes.background: Despite 16 and 17 year olds in the UK being able to work, drive a vehicle, get married or even join the armed forces they are still deprived of the right to vote. Lowering the voting age would give the youth a fair say in matters such as education or employment and will make the UK more democratic.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104603

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
